# Olaf Schwarz

| birth_place    = Germany

| medaltemplates =
}}
Olaf Schwarz (born 2 April 1969) is a former West German male canoeist who was twice silver medalist in Canadian C1 at senior level at the Wildwater Canoeing World Championships.
